cause.description:
All over the world there's old people and there's poverty. But old people are people with long workiing life with history they made change in our world. All of these reasons should make us care about them and want to help them. By minimum payment 1 dollar can make the most wonderful change and smile on their face.
1. Old people should be all over the world taked care.
2. Live in a good healthy way and happy.
3. They should take care food and some silly things the should also enjoy their time.
cause.name: Love Old
